account.delete-account-header: Enter your password if you are sure you want to delete your Digital ID
account.delete-account-message: Deleting your Digital ID is irreversible, all your data will be lost!
account.delete-succes: Your account has been succesfully deleted. You will now logout
account.delete-fail: Something went wrong, your account could not by fully deleted.

create-identity.introduction: To create a Digital ID you need to complete the following steps.
create-identity.info-message:
The following two parts of your information is used to create a digital ID.

1. Your username (which you will create below)
2. Your Password (which must consists of 4 digits/numbers)

If you create a Digital ID for this pilot program it will be stored securely on the Netherlands Red Cross Server. What is a Server? In this case the server is the physical computer that a server program runs on and it is owned by The Netherlands Red Cross.
create-identity.username-password: Create a username and a password.
create-identity.info-message-username-pw:
To create a Digital Identity you need to create the following

3. Your username (which you can create by following this video advise)
4. Your Password (which you can create by following this video advise)

If you create a Digital ID for this pilot program it will be stored securely on the Netherlands Red Cross Server. What is a Server? In this case the server is the physical computer that a server program runs on and it is owned by The Netherlands Red Cross.
create-identity.create-password-explanation: Enter a password of at least {{minimalLength}} characters:
create-identity.username-not-unique: The username you provide is not unique. Please try again.
create-identity.unequal-passwords: The passwords you provided are not the same. Please try again.
create-identity.conclusion: Great! You have created a Digital ID.

login-identity.introduction: To use an existing Digital ID you need to log in with your username and password.
login-identity.incorrect-credentials: The combination of username and password you provided is not recognized. Please try again.

enroll-in-program.introduction: Hello this is {{ngo}}. We have received your request to apply for {{programTitle}}.
enroll-in-program.introduction-questions: To make sure you get the best possible help and a fair process, we need some personal information.
enroll-in-program.dob-feedback: Your date of birth does not have a valid format. Please adjust and save again.
enroll-in-program.please-confirm: Below is an overview of your information. Please check and submit.
enroll-in-program.confirm-received: Next step: Make an appointment for Digital ID activation and program application.
enroll-in-program.prepare-documents: To save time at your appointment, make sure to bring these documents:

signup-signin.info-message:
The following two parts of your information is used to create a digital ID.

1. Your username (which you will create below)
2. Your Password (which must consists of 4 digits/numbers)

If you create a Digital ID for this pilot program it will be stored securely on the Netherlands Red Cross Server. What is a Server? In this case the server is the physical computer that a server program runs on and it is owned by The Netherlands Red Cross.

select-fsp.introduction: If you are included in the program, how would you like to receive your money?
select-fsp.conclusion: Thank you. You have selected the option {{name}}.

attributes.introduction: For this option we also need the following:
attributes.error: Something went wrong, please try again.
attributes.success: Thank you. Your additional information is saved.

select-appointment.introduction: Next step: select your option for Digital ID activation and program application.
select-appointment.thanks-repeat: You have selected the following option:
select-appointment.documents: Please ensure you have the following documents:
select-appointment.conclusion: Thank you. Your appointment for Digital ID activation and program application is confirmed.

set-notification-number.introduction1: It is optional to enter your phone number.
set-notification-number.introduction2: We use this to send you text-notifications when you are included or not and when you receive money.
set-notification-number.introduction3: If you do not want to enter your phone number, you have to log in here for updates.
set-notification-number.introduction4: At the end of the program, we will not keep your number.
set-notification-number.conclusion-submitted: Thank you. You will now receive notifications on this phone number: {{phone}}
set-notification-number.conclusion-skipped: You have chosen not to leave a phone number. Please log in back here regularly, to check on updates.
set-notification-number.logout-info: If you want, you can now log out, under the account-button on the top right. When you return here, you can log in with your username and password.

meeting-reminder.documents: Make sure to bring these documents:
meeting-reminder.qr-code: Please show this QR-code at your meeting.
meeting-reminder.meeting-reminder: Thank you. Here is everything you need to know about your meeting:
meeting-reminder.meeting-count-down: Your meeting appointment takes place in {{daysToMeeting}} days.
meeting-reminder.meeting-tomorrow: Your meeting appointment takes place tomorrow.
meeting-reminder.meeting-today: Your meeting appointment takes place today.

select-language.introduction:
Welcome to 121. Please select your language.

Bienvenu chez 121. Choisi votre langue.

Bienvenido a 121. Selecciona tu idioma.
select-language.info-message:
With the 121 platform, we aim to make Cash Based Aid safe, fast & fair, to help you if you have been affected by disasters and crises to meet your own needs. 121 will help you
  • Create a Digtial ID
  • Know which programs are available in your area
  • Apply to the programs
  • Understand who sees your information

select-program.info-message:
How was the Pilot created?
This 121 Pilot has been created with Dorcas who have worked together with your communities in
  • Bishoftu Camp 1
  • Bishoftu Camp 2
  • Bishoftu Camp 3
  • Bishoftu Camp 4
  • Bishoftu Camp 5
  • Bishoftu Camp 6
  • Bishoftu Camp 7
  • Bishoftu Camp 8

Together your community and Dorcas decided how to Identify 250 households that are most in need of Cash based Aid. Needs are based on looking at family size and if or your family members are
  • Chronically ill
  • Disabled
  • Pregnant
  • Lactating
  • Widowed

If you are included in the program it will mean that you will receive the cash as

  • unconditional, meaning to receive it you only need to fulfill the criteria of “most in need”.
  • unrestricted, meaning whomever receives it, can spend it in any way they see fit.

What will the each of the 250 households receive?
Together your community and Dorcas decided to give
XXX ETB given in 1 payment.

When will the each of the 250 households receive it?
Together your community and Dorcas decided how to give
Payment 1 of 1: XXX MKW on XX-XX-XXXX

Where will the each of the 250 households get it?
Together your community and Eagles decided Identified the following ways
  • Bank of Oromia

How does it work?
After 121 registration/Digital ID Creation and Registration/Digital ID Activation

  • An initial list of included will be created.
  • This list will be shared within the community leaders
  • The existing community leaders will give feedback on the list to Dorcas.
  • Dorcas will take this feedback to create the final list (final decision is by Dorcas)
  • If you have a phone number you will receive a text message to tell you if you are included

If you do not have a phone number you will be able to see a list in your community to check if you are included or excluded

store-credential.done: Your Digital ID has been activated by {{ngo}}.
store-credential.received: Your Digital ID is received on your device.
store-credential.stored: Your Digital ID is stored in your wallet.

handle-proof.creating: You have given us sufficient personal information to see if you can be part of the program.
handle-proof.notify: We will notify you if you have been included.
handle-proof.inclusion-status-positive: Thank you for your patience. You have been included in the program.
handle-proof.inclusion-status-negative: Thank you for your patience. You have not been included in the program.

validation.generic-error: We cannot process some of your input. Please check and update one of your answers.
validation.phoneNumber: We couldn't verify that phone-number. Please update and try again.

connection.error-retry: Something went wrong, do you want to try again?
